features: Find your serenity with White Lavender & Vanilla Orchid scent, an immersion of fresh lavender and white floral notes blended together with cozy vanilla, warm woods, and musk.
Using fabric softener in the wash can provide better softness, better freshness, reducing wrinkles, and reducing static cling to the fabrics in your clothes, towels, and sheets.
Add Snuggle brand liquid fabric softener during the final rinse cycle or use an automatic dispenser for added convenience.
Safe for standard and high efficiency (HE) washing machines
Includes one 80 ounce bottle of Snuggle liquid fabric softener, enough for 188 loads.
body.description: Find your serenity with White Lavender & Vanilla Orchid scent, an immersion of fresh lavender and white floral notes blended together with cozy vanilla, warm woods, and musk. Using fabric softener in the wash can provide better softness, better freshness, reducing wrinkles, and reducing static cling to the fabrics in your clothes, towels, and sheets. For a top loader washing machine, add Snuggle brand liquid fabric softener during the final rinse cycle or use an automatic dispenser for added convenience. To avoid spotting, do not pour Snuggle directly onto clothes. For a front loader machine, add Snuggle brand liquid fabric softener to the built-in fabric softener tray that is often placed to the right or left of the detergent tray. Safe for standard and HE washing machines. Includes one 80 ounce bottle of liquid fabric softener, enough for 188 loads.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Lavender & Vanilla Orchid Blue Iris & Ocean Breeze Island Hibiscus & Rainflower Scent Cues An immersion of fresh lavender and white floral scents blended together with notes of cozy vanilla, warm woods, and musk. A refreshing burst of blue iris and bamboo flower notes mixed with crisp green apple, soft bamboo, and woody freshness. A delightful combination of soft white florals, bright hibiscus notes and lush lotus flowers blended with notes of juicy tropical fruits. Available in Liquid Fabric Softener, Scent Booster Beads, Scent Booster Pacs and Dryer Sheets Liquid Fabric Softener, Scent Booster Beads, Scent Booster Pacs and Dryer Sheets Liquid Fabric Softener, Scent Booster Beads, Scent Booster Pacs and Dryer Sheets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Snuggle Exhilarations Lavender and Vanilla Orchid Fabric Softener - A Fragrant Delight
reviews.reviewText: The Snuggle Exhilarations Liquid Fabric Softener in Lavender and Vanilla Orchid has truly enhanced my laundry routine with its captivating scent and lasting freshness:Irresistible Aroma (5/5): The fragrance of Lavender and Vanilla Orchid is simply delightful. It adds a touch of luxury to every load of laundry. This softener doesn't just make clothes feel soft; it also leaves them smelling heavenly.Long-Lasting Scent (5/5): One of the remarkable features of this fabric softener is its ability to retain its fragrance even after going through the dryer. It's always a pleasant surprise to open the dryer and be greeted by the same lovely scent that was there when you poured it in.In summary, the Snuggle Exhilarations Lavender and Vanilla Orchid Fabric Softener is a game-changer when it comes to laundry. It infuses your clothes with an irresistible scent that lingers even after drying. If you're looking to elevate your laundry experience and add a touch of luxury to your fabrics, this fabric softener is a fantastic choice.
